title: The Six Cross Roads Branch
description: The Six Cross Roads Branch Library is strategically situated in St. Philip just off the Six Roads Roundabout which has been renamed the Wynter Crawford Circle . This library offers a variety of amenities such as access to EBSCO online database which contains e-books journals, newspapers and magazines, free Wi-fi and computer use, Internet access and photocopying services. Story hour is held on Fridays from 5:00 p.m to 6:00 p.m. This area is surrounded by a post office, an industrial estate, pharmacies, supermarket, banks, clothing stores, fast food restaurant outlets, polyclinic and a secondary school. Our regular hours are Monday to Friday 10:30 a.m. to 1:00 p.m. and 2:00 p.m. to 6:00 p.m.
